tools

Class DirectoryUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.DirectoryUtils

  • public class DirectoryUtils
extends Object
    A set of utilities to assist with the recursive nature of directories.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      DirectoryUtils()

      Finds the first file in the given folder that matches the provided filter
      static Set<File> getFiles(File dir, FileFilter filter)
      Looks for all files matching the provided filter recursively.

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public static scala.Option<File> find(File folder,
                      FileFilter filter)
        Finds the first file in the given folder that matches the provided filter
        Parameters:
        folder - The folder to look in
        filter - The filter to apply
        Returns:
        The first found file wrapped in an Option in case none was found.

      • locateFolder

        public static scala.Option<File> locateFolder(File currentDir,
                              String folderName)
        Looks for a folder with the given name recursively in a provided directory.
        Parameters:
        currentDir - The directory to start looking in
        folderName - The name of the desired directory
        Returns:
        The located directory wrapped in an Option in case it wasn't found

      • getFiles

        public static Set<File> getFiles(File dir,
                 FileFilter filter)
        Looks for all files matching the provided filter recursively.
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory to start looking from
        filter - The filter to apply
        Returns:
        The set all of all files that matched the filter
